data.name: plSource.Help
data.value: You can view the file's contents in the text box below. If you are running on a local machine then you can also edit and modify the source.

data.name: plFile.Help
data.value: Select the File whose source you wish to view.

data.name: NoFileTypeSelected.Text
data.value: You must select a File Type to Edit before clicking the Update button.

data.name: plLanguage.Help
data.value: Select your preferred language for developing the module

data.name: plTemplate.Help
data.value: Select your preferred module development template. Module development templates are stored in the Modules subfolder within the Host Root folder.

data.name: plControl.Help
data.value: Enter a unique name for your module control.

data.name: FolderNameInvalid.Text
data.value: The Folder Name identified for this Module does not exist. Please review the settings for this Module in Host / Extensions.

data.name: AddControlError.Text
data.value: You Must Select A Module Template And Provide A Control Name.
